body.name: HAUOMS Queen Bed Frame with Storage Headboard and RGB LED Lights, Modern Upholstered Platform Bed Frame Queen Size with Charging Station, Stable Easy Assembly,Dark Gray
features: 【Practical Storage Headboard】-The bookcase headboard allows you to conveniently place your mobile phone, books and other commonly used small items.Additionally, of which the shelves on either side are made of glass for light transmission, beauty and practicality. The storage headboard also can be opened, providing you with a hidden storage space, which is very practical.

【Smart LED Bed Frame】-This HAUOMS bed frame supports the headboard and underbed RGB LED light. beautiful Multi-colour RGB LED Light(There are over 60000 colors to choose from),Phone App +Remote Control multiple control modes for you to effortlessly create your favorite bedroom atmosphere. Whether you want soft, warm lights for reading or vibrant colors for ambiance, this smart bed has it all. Start enjoying the endless possibilities of this modern smart LED bed frame!

【Height Adjustable Headboard with Charging Station】-The built-in power strip on the headboard has 2 outlets &1 USB ports and 1 Type C, which is very convenient for you to charge your phone, tablet, headphones and other electronic devices. Plus, The headboard of this upholstered bed frame has two adjustable heights. The recommended mattress height is 8-12 inches.

【Under-Bed Lights & Storage】-The under-bed light gives the bed frame a stunning visual effect, which is equivalent to a small night light, bringing you a more technological and convenient experience at night. the queen bed frame features 6 inches of under-bed storage space perfect for storing extra odds and ends. You can store storage boxes, suitcases and more to keep your bedroom looking tidy, and the sweeper is easy to get in and out of, no more bending over to clean.

【Sturty & Durable Structure】-Designed with durable wooden slats, 12 solid wooden slats, 2 metal brackets, and 9 legs to ensure the comfort and durability, the maximum weight recommendation is up to 800 pounds. To avoid noise caused by friction between crossbeams, we designed an exclusive sponge patch for the main beam. We are trying to provide a safe and convenient bed frame for our clientsof the bed frame.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The King Size bed is spectacular for the price, the quality is amazing, the price is amazing, and the build was easy. However, the reason why I gave it a 4 star rating was that the instructions were not 100% clear or accurate. It took me longer than needed to build it due to the fact that a single part was misused in the instructions manual. It told me to place two different pieces in the same area and was confused to the point where I had to YouTube the build. Later to find out, the piece that was incorrect was the crossbar to support the mattress. If that gets fixed in the manual, it will be a 5/5 stars. I believe the piece was labeled as "i" that needs to be revised in the manual on page 3 or 4.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So worth it!
reviews.reviewText: This bed is awesome make sure you have someone to help you at installing the headboard but other then that you can do it by yourself, took 1.5 hours but kept taking breaks so probably could have done it in an hour. Nice quality havnt installed the bottom lights yet but all in all it of very niceDef purchase I will be getting another one soon for my other son. FAST SHIPPING also came 2 days after I ordered when It said wouldn't arrive for a weekYou will not be disappointed 😌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very well built
reviews.reviewText: I’m very pleased with how great the bed is built , however there were black spots all over the fabric and won’t come out. The cloth is white and it looks used almost

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The seller has great communication
reviews.reviewText: The seller was a delight to work with. I am, however, disappointed in FedEx’s job when he tumbled my product off his ramp which resulted in damages on the bed the seller was very apologetic and did offer a partial refund. The bet itself is solid. It’s not super Duper top-of-the-line high-quality but it is a decent product and I am happy overall. I can’t brag enough about how easy the seller was to work with

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewText: it's a great bed for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome, well thought out
reviews.reviewText: The bed design is awesome. Extra storage in a convenient location. The plugs and outlets all worked perfectly and the lights come with a controller and 6 different color options. Also has a timer feature. Side pockets for your remotes and miscellaneous items. There’s shelves as well on top of the storage. Perfect bed, honestly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this, but
reviews.reviewText: I really like the style and looks and everything of this bed but I need to know if I remove the slats of course it will work with my adjustable bed. I spent thousands of dollars on an adjustable bed and massaging mattress this year and it says pretty much any bedroom that you can remove the middle from will work, but I need to ask you before I take the product out of the box if you company thinks that it will work within an adjustable bed, I’ve got a king size adjustable bed split, but I’m not gonna be using the split mattress split king base

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
